name: Twinkle (ZaqLovesBooks)
description:
This game is not at all finished.

 But I plan to continue until the 12th. After words, I'll take a break.

 Do I wish to once day finish this game?

Yes I do.

But for now this is all we have .

Summary:

Twinkle is a rpg bout a star who turned human. They now find out what's going on and what's their purpose of being here.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

Action key : z/enter

Credit(s):

Character sprite for star and animal companion by :   nuttatulipa ( itch.io and twitter)
